Name: Final Age
About the game: FINAL AGE is a first person single player psychological horror game. In this game, the player takes on the role of a curious investigator who is drawn to a cottage located in the outskirts of a forest. The cottage was previously owned by an army man who mysteriously disappeared during a war . He had been missing since six months. Neighbors complain that they hear strange sounds from that cottage, as if someone is staying there. But investigators say that it is vacant since the army man is missing. As the player approaches the cottage, he begin to hear eerie sounds. It seems as though the cottage is alive, with each creak and groan of the old wood conveying an ominous message. The player is determined to uncover the truth behind the creepy noises and decides to explore the cottage.As the player delves deeper into the cottage, they start to experience strange visions and hallucinations, making it difficult to distinguish between reality and fiction. Throughout the game , the player will need to solve puzzles and uncover clues in order to progress. The game is designed to mess with the player's mind, and horror elements are more psychological than physical. The atmosphere is dark and foreboding. As the player edges closer to the truth, they must confront their own fears and unravel the dark secrets of the army man's past. Note: Game contains tricky puzzles. Needs good observation
